title: Wide Legged Forward Bend B
description: Forward bends, Hip openers, Inversions, Standing Primary body parts engaged Hamstrings, Lower Back, Spine Calves, Glutes & Hip Flexors, Middle Back / Lats, Upper Back & Lower Traps Strengthens legs and spine, stretches groins Develops sense of balance How to perform Wide Legged Forward Bend B Stand with your feet 3 to 5 feet apart and parallel. Place your hands on your hips. Lengthen your spine with an inhale. Bend forward with an exhale, keeping your spine long.
